title: 6th-Grade Optical Science Education Course Utilizing Rule-Based AI Chatbots

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science terminology and experimental observation experience
context.additional_context: Science Literacy Enhancement Program for Adult Learners in Vocational Training Institutions, Operated During Afternoon/Evening Hours Considering the Characteristics of Working Professionals

learning_goals: Students can explain fundamental principles of optical phenomena (reflection, refraction, dispersion) through interaction with an AI chatbot
Learners enhance their ability to analyze scientific experiment data and formulate hypotheses via chatbot-supported inquiry activities
Students can propose creative problem-solving solutions applying optical principles in collaborative projects
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
